title: How do I configure email settings?
answer:
Adding an email account 

 On the home screen, touch Email ,select mailbox category,then enter account setup; 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111375) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111376)

 An email account can be configured automatically or manually 

 Manual setup: 

 1. After select mailbox category,then enter account setup; 

 2. On the Account setup screen, enter your email account name and password. Touch Manual setup. 

 3. Touch POP3 to display the incoming server settings screen. 

 4. Touch Next to configure the outgoing server settings. 

 5. Touch Next to configure the email receiving settings, such as the inbox refresh frequency. 

 6. Touch Next to name the account and enter your name. 

 7. Touch Done to log in to your email and then access the inbox of the email account. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111377)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111378)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111379)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111380)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111381)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111382)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111383)

 Auto setup:   
 (You can automatically set up your email account for certain email service providers only when the parameters of the email have been preconfigured on your phone. To automatically set up an email account, do as follows:) 

 1. After select mailbox category,then enter account setup; 

 1. On the Account setup screen, enter your email account name and password. 

 3. Touch Next and configure the email receiving settings, such as the inbox refresh frequency. 

 4. Touch Next to name the account and enter your name. 

 5. Touch Done to log in to your email and then access the inbox of the email account. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111384)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111385)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111386)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111387)

 Sending an email 

 On the Inbox screen, touch the write email icon ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111388)in the lower left corner, create an email,then enter the recipient, subject, ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111389)attachment,and email content, and touch the icon ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111390) in the upper right corner to send the email. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111391)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111392)

 View and delete an email 

 On the Inbox screen, touch an email to view it, or touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111393) to delete it. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111394)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111395) 

 Deleting an email account 

 On the Inbox screen, touch the menu button![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111396). From the displayed option menu, choose Settings. Touch the email account you want to delete. Flick down to the bottom and touch Remove account. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111397)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111398)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111399)
